name: Chasing Tales: Asaliea the Channeler
requirement: Acquire a Dragonsblood focus and perform tasks to re-create Asaliea's legend.

bits.text: Acquire the heroic spirit of Asaliea: deed #1.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Asaliea: deed #2.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Asaliea: deed #3.
Meet with the spirit of Asaliea at a heroic font.
